content: **pearls before swine character set- part 1 pig rat croc** are you a fan of pearls before swine i created these for my brother and decided it was time for a free pattern to share with others make just your favorite or all three this pattern is part 1 since i intend to publish a part 2 later with a few more of the characters **terms of use/copyright information ** pearls before swine rights belong to the author stephan pastis this pattern is available to fans to create and share but not for selling or other commercial purposes **** have corrections or suggestions for the pattern do you want to be involved in part 2 let me know *** edit 2013-05-02 part 2 is now available check it out here 1 now you can add goat and zebra to the mix 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pearls-before-swine--goat-zebra
